class_notes: This section is for InEmory MN semester 3 students only. This course contains a clinical component. Clinical may be scheduled any day not in lecture, including weekends for 12 hours; onsite simulation may be scheduled any day not in lecture except Sundays.
course_description: Students will use critical thinking skills to provide care to women and newborns integrating physical, psychosocial, cultural and spiritual perspectives. Reproductive health promotion and risk reduction in the community setting is emphasized.
